author: Conor Lally
title: Cost of policing visit of Duke and Duchess of Cambridge put at €1.3m
description: Major security operation was required during 48 hour visit to Ireland by British royals
content:
The cost to the Garda of providing security during the recent visit of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge to Ireland has been estimated at 1.3 million.
A major security operation was required when Prince William and Kate Middleton visited the Republic last mo… [+2755 chars]
